articles.title: PNB raises profit guidance to Rs 7,000 cr for FY24 - The Economic Times
articles.description: Going by revised guidance, the fourth quarter profit would be upwards of Rs 2,000 crore as well. In the third quarter ended December 2023, the bank earned a profit of Rs 2,223 crore, registering an over 253 per cent jump over the same quarter a year ago.
